text: Piešťany (; ; ; ) is a town in the Trnava Region in Slovakia. It is the capital of the district of the same name. It is a famous spa town. About 28,000 people live there. == References == == Other websites == * Piešťany town * Piešťany spa Category:Towns in Slovakia Category:Spa towns in Slovakia Category:Trnava Region
title: Piešťany
